sub_title: Technical Project Leader (Special Projects) @ Van Gelder Group
summary:
I want to energize the world, both literally and figuratively. I believe that with the energy transition we have a historic opportunity to change the world for the better. Managing this challenging process is of great interest to me and I find it very fulfilling to be on the forefront of it during my daily job. 

I am always up for a cup of coffee and a good discussion about how we are going to transition the world into being circular and sustainable! 

On a more personal note, I like to travel and explore new places. Go out and have a good time with friends and family, or sit at home and watch a good Western movie all by myself (I highly recommend For a Few Dollars More). 

______________________________________________

Feel free to add me on LinkedIn, or contact me through my email! 

mail: malik_belabed@msn.com
